long_description: The Haiku iPad Sleeve 2 protects your iPad or other tablet computer during travels. Choose from majolica blue or blue profusion print colors. Recycled polyethylene is made from plastic beverage bottles; textured fabric is durable and soft, yet tough. TSA checkpoint-friendly design allows for a clear and unobstructed image when undergoing X-ray screening. Secure felt main pocket stores your iPad and a back pocket stores tickets or papers. Carry it via the top grab handle or wear it cross body with the removable adjustable shoulder strap. The sleeve is sized to easily stash in another bag. Closeout.
short_description: The Haiku iPad Sleeve 2 protects your iPad or other tablet computer during travels. Choose from majolica blue or blue profusion print colors.
